description: Brand compliance hooks - checks style files for brand guideline adherence

hooks.prompt:
Check if the file just written/edited is a style file (CSS, SCSS, Less, Tailwind config) or contains user-facing copy (JSX, TSX, Vue, HTML templates). If so, briefly note any potential brand compliance concerns:

1. For style files: Look for hardcoded hex colors (should use CSS variables), hardcoded font families (should use brand fonts), arbitrary pixel values for spacing

2. For UI files: Look for generic button labels (Submit, OK, Click here), technical error messages, words that might conflict with brand voice

If no concerns or file is not brand-relevant, respond with just 'No brand concerns.' Otherwise, briefly list 1-3 key concerns to investigate. Keep response under 100 words.
